fr.escape.game.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collisionable, Drawable, Moveable, Updateable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bonus, Boss, Ship, Shot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBonus, AbstractBoss, AbstractShip, AbstractShot, BlackHoleShot, EarthShot, FireBallShot, JupiterShot, MissileShot, MoonShot, ShiboleetShot

    public interface Entity
extends Updateable, Collisionable, Drawable, Moveable

    An Entity is a Components in the World.

    Note: This is an abstract concept.
